title: Rain water pipes shall be connected to Rain Water Harvesting system, if required to be provided under these Regulations or to a drain through a covered channel formed beneath the public footpath to connect the rain water pipes to the road side storm water drain or in any other approved manner
clause_text: Rain water pipes shall be connected to Rain Water Harvesting system, if required to be provided under these Regulations or to a drain through a covered channel formed beneath the public footpath to connect the rain water pipes to the road side storm water drain or in any other approved manner.
